seed_pair.target: No me importa si quieres irte sin el coche.
seed_pair.known: I don't mind if you want to leave without the car.

S0531: No es verdad que cualquiera pueda ganar el juego.
It isn't true that anyone can win the game.
S0533: No escuchará cada palabra que dices.
She won't listen to every word you say.
S0534: No vayamos afuera con este clima espantoso.
Let's not go outside in this dreadful weather.
S0535: Hizo una promesa de que no elegiría el trabajo equivocado.
He made a promise that he wouldn't choose the wrong job.
S0536: Solía pensar que ser loco era malo.
I used to think that being crazy was bad.
S0538: No quiero parecer como si no me importara.
I don't want to seem as though I don't care.
